DataElement.preferredDefinition: A microarray is a piece of glass or plastic on which different samples have been affixed at separate locations in an ordered manner thus forming a microscopic array.  The samples are usually DNA fragments but may also be antibodies, other proteins, or tissues.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._In the scientific method, an experiment is a set of actions and observations, performed to verify or falsify a hypothesis or research a causal relationship between phenomena. The experiment is a cornerstone of the empirical approach to knowledge. (from Wikipedia):The words or language units by which a thing is known._Value Domain for java language String datatype.

Property.preferredDefinition: In the scientific method, an experiment is a set of actions and observations, performed to verify or falsify a hypothesis or research a causal relationship between phenomena. The experiment is a cornerstone of the empirical approach to knowledge. (from Wikipedia):The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.
The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
